data.name: TextBox1.Text
data.value:
Infinity Media Encoder
This program is possible to install in Individual / Company / School / Government anywhere and use freely. Copyright © 2014-2015 K.G.P License: Freeware
----------------------------------------------
FFmpeg for Infinity Media Encoder
Source: http://sourceforge.net/projects/infinity-media-encoder/files/FFmpeg/Source/ Copyright (c) 2000-2015 the FFmpeg developers License: GPLv3
----------------------------------------------
